languages.text: This special-made handcuffs allows the wearer to apply Can't Attack on adjacent enemy for 1 Round once per combat.

traits.locale_text: This special-made handcuffs allows the wearer to apply Can't Attack on adjacent enemy for 1 Round once per combat.

languages.text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Эти наручники специальной разработки один раз за бой позволяют персонажу наложить {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g} на врага на соседней клетке на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Эти наручники специальной разработки один раз за бой позволяют персонажу наложить {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g} на врага на соседней клетке на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Эти наручники специальной разработки один раз за бой позволяют персонажу наложить {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g} на врага на соседней клетке на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Эти наручники специальной разработки один раз за бой позволяют персонажу наложить {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}неспособность атаковать{/g} на врага на соседней клетке на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: 每场战斗一次，装备者可以使用这个特制手铐，对周围所有邻近敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗一次，装备者可以使用这个特制手铐，对周围所有邻近敌人施加{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Une fois par combat, ces menottes spécialement conçues permettent à leur porteur d'infliger l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g} à un ennemi adjacent pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par combat, ces menottes spécialement conçues permettent à leur porteur d'infliger l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g} à un ennemi adjacent pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Una vez por combate, estas esposas especializadas permiten al portador infligir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g} a un enemigo adyacente durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por combate, estas esposas especializadas permiten al portador infligir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g} a un enemigo adyacente durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘中に1回、この特別に作られた手錠は使用者が隣接する敵に1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}効果を与える。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中に1回、この特別に作られた手錠は使用者が隣接する敵に1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}効果を与える。

languages.text: Özel imal edilen bu kelepçe, takan kişinin çatışmada bir kez bitişikteki düşman üzerinde {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramama{/g} etkisi oluşturabilmesini sağlar. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Özel imal edilen bu kelepçe, takan kişinin çatışmada bir kez bitişikteki düşman üzerinde {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramama{/g} etkisi oluşturabilmesini sağlar. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Einmal pro Kampf kann der Träger dieser speziellen Handschellen einen Gegner auf einem angrenzenden Feld 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Kann nicht angreifen{/g} belegen.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Einmal pro Kampf kann der Träger dieser speziellen Handschellen einen Gegner auf einem angrenzenden Feld 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Kann nicht angreifen{/g} belegen.
